title: Switch default custom domain to jpdigitalmarketing.in across provisioning UI

requirements.text: Update the applicationâ€™s custom domain target from "jpdigitalmarketing.net" to "jpdigitalmarketing.in" so that when no custom domain is configured yet, the UI pre-fills and recommends "jpdigitalmarketing.in" and all user-facing example text references "jpdigitalmarketing.in" (not .net).
acceptanceCriteria: When the backend returns no configured custom domain, the custom domain input is pre-filled with "jpdigitalmarketing.in".
All user-facing example text in the provisioning/publishing UI that previously referenced "jpdigitalmarketing.net" now references "jpdigitalmarketing.in" (including alerts and descriptions).
After using the "Delete/Reset site configuration" action, the UI resets the custom domain input back to the default "jpdigitalmarketing.in" and reflects the unconfigured/offline state.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.

Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add migration logic only if state changes require it.
nonGoals: Investigate or fix the external production deployment error itself (beyond updating the domain value shown/used by the app).
Add new authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Introduce external databases or additional backend services.
